title: LIFEGUARD: Practical Repair of Persistent Route Failures
description: Examination of long-term network outages using data from measurement tests, and proposal of a system for detection, localization, and remediation
authors: E. Katz-Bassett, C. Scott, D. Choffnes, I. Cunha, V. Valancius, N. Feamster, H. Madhyastha, T. Anderson, A. Krishnamurthy
